name: Latex ref to autoref for figs
content:
Replace
Fig \ref{}
Fig. \ref{}a
Fig. \ref{}a-b
Fig. \ref{} a
Figure ...
Fig ...
etc.

with 
\autoref{}
\autoref{}a
\autoref{}a-b

Add the following to the preamble
\usepackage[hidelinks]{hyperref} % for \autoref
%\renewcommand*{\figureautorefname}{Fig.} % abbreviate figures
%\renewcommand*{\tableautorefname}{Tab.} % abbreviate tables
author: Martin KS
